dcterms:creator: Yanjun Gao
Dmitriy Dligach
Timothy Miller
John Caskey
Brihat Sharma
Matthew M. Churpek
Majid Afshar
dcterms:description: A comprehensive generative AI framework designed to evaluate diagnostic reasoning capabilities of generative language models, consisting of six tasks representing key components in clinical reasoning.
dcterms:title: DR.BENCH

dcterms:creator: Chaitanya Shivade
dcterms:description: A natural language inference dataset for the clinical domain, consisting of sentence pairs to determine if a hypothesis can be inferred from a premise.
dcterms:title: MedNLI

dcterms:creator: Yanjun Gao
John Caskey
Timothy Miller
Brihat Sharma
Matthew M. Churpek
Dmitriy Dligach
Majid Afshar
dcterms:description: A dataset focused on labeling relations between the assessment and treatment plan sections in clinical notes.
dcterms:title: Assessment and Plan Reasoning (A/P)

dcterms:creator: Anusri Pampari
Preethi Raghavan
Jennifer Liang
Jian Peng
dcterms:description: A large corpus for question answering based on electronic medical records, specifically designed to answer questions from discharge summaries.
dcterms:title: emrQA

dcterms:creator: Yanjun Gao
Dmitriy Dligach
Timothy Miller
John Caskey
Brihat Sharma
Matthew M. Churpek
Majid Afshar
dcterms:description: A dataset aimed at producing a list of relevant problems and diagnoses based on SOAP sections of progress notes.
dcterms:title: Problem Summarization (ProbSumm)

dcterms:creator: Di Jin
Eileen Pan
Nassim Oufattole
Wei-Hung Weng
Hanyi Fang
Peter Szolovits
dcterms:description: A large-scale open domain question answering dataset derived from medical board exams, consisting of question-answer pairs.
dcterms:title: Medical Board Exam Question Answering (MedQA)

dcterms:creator: Eric Lehman
Alistair Johnson
dcterms:description: Clinical datasets consisting of de-identified data from intensive care units, used for training language models.
dcterms:title: MIMIC-III and MIMIC-IV
